title: Microsoft | SE | Noida | 2YOE @Amazon
content:
**Education:** B.E CSE 2022 Grad | Tier 3 College

**Years of Experience:** 2 years at Amazon

**Date of the Offer:** September, 2024

**Company:** Microsoft

**Title/Level:** Software Engineer / Level 60

**Location:** Noida, India

**Salary:** INR 2,140,000 (Total Base Pay)

**Relocation/Signing Bonus:**
- Signing Bonus: INR 200,000 (paid in two installments)
- Relocation Allowance: One-time gross payout of INR 300,000

**Stock bonus:** On-hire Stock Award worth USD 70,000 (vesting details subject to company policy)

**Bonus:** Eligible for annual performance bonus, up to 20% of bonus-eligible salary (approx. INR 428,000)

**Total comp (without Stock):** Approx. INR 3,152,173

**Benefits:** 
- HRA, LTA, Provident Fund contribution, Special Allowance
- Annual review with eligibility for merit increase and future stock awards
- Relocation benefits (conditions apply)

**Other details:** Signing bonus is repayable under certain conditions if employment is terminated within 24 months. The On-hire Stock Award is subject to the 2017 stock award plan terms and will be calculated based on the stock price at the grant date.

title: PayPal | SE-2 | Chennai | 2YOE @Amazon
content:
**Education:**  2022 Grad | B.E CSE at Tier-3 college

**Years of Experience:** 2 years at Amazon


**Date of the Offer:** October 2024

**Company:** PayPal

**Title/Level:** T23 / SDE2

**Location:** Chennai/India

**Salary:** INR 2,400,000 (Total Base Pay)

**Relocation/Signing Bonus:** Nil

**Stock bonus:** RSU worth USD 22,000 (vests over 3 years, approx. INR 1,826,000 at current rate)

**Bonus:** INR 240,000 (Annual Incentive Program, split between cash and equity)

**Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):** INR 4,538,120

**Benefits:** 
- Meal Card 
- Provident Fund contribution 
- Gratuity 
- Flexible Basket Components: Includes HRA, LTA, Special Allowance, Vehicle Reimbursement, Books & Periodicals, Internet & Telephone, and NPS (optional)

title: Fidelity International | Graduate Programmer Analyst |  PPO
content:
Education: B.Tech CSE from Tier-2 Institute
Years of Experience: 0.5
Prior Experience: Multiple internships / freelance as full stack developer
Date of the Offer: September 2024
Company: Fidelity International
Title/Level: Graduate Programmer Analyst
Location: Gurugram
Salary: 8,00,000
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 10 days hotel stay for relocation
Stock bonus: N/A
Bonus: 1,00,000 perf. based
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 9,00,000
Benefits: Free transport, free lunch and dinner, 4 days a week WFH.

title: Autodesk | SDE-1 | Fresh Grad 2024
content:

Location: Pune
